Quetzalcoatl:

"He's in stasis"repied qet and added kidding "perhaps you should come 
back until he wakes up in 40 millions of years or so, un less 
Grimlock likes to give his agreement, I personaly don't care while 
you don't distubr the others sleepers as Megatron"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Yggdrasil stands tight and a bit nervous.
> 
> Yggdrasil: I would like to see my ancestor, Optimus Prime. It is
> simply a matter of superstition and fascination... You know, I 
always
> hoped I would turn out to be as good a leader as he was...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Windlord/Quetzalcoatl:
> > 
> > "What request?"said the male. Windlord didn't say anything and 
> > looked them
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > Yggdrasil nods and bows a little.
> > > 
> > > Yggdrasil: Yes Kup. I will be going soon since there's not much 
> > for me
> > > to do anyways... But Quetzalcoatl... I would like to make one 
> > request
> > > first...
> > >

> > > >

Rodimus 
> > of
> > > the siutation?
> > > > 
> > > >

> > > >

want

others
